name: kierr
description: Curated collection of high-quality Claude Code plugins for enhanced productivity and development workflow

plugins.name: docs
plugins.description: Access official Claude Code documentation instantly with intelligent search and contextual help. Perfect for both beginners learning Claude Code and experienced developers needing quick reference.

plugins.name: memory
plugins.description: Track tool usage and extract session memories at configurable thresholds for enhanced context continuity. Essential for long-term projects and complex development sessions.

plugins.name: trunk
plugins.description: Advanced Trunk integration for automated code quality, workflow automation, and CI/CD pipeline management. Perfect for teams serious about code quality and development velocity.

plugins.name: fs-mv
plugins.description: Configurable file movement plugin that automatically organizes files based on patterns and project structure. Perfect for maintaining clean project organization and automating tedious file management tasks.

plugins.name: rules
plugins.description: Intelligent rule interpolation system with Cursor-style MDC support, pattern matching, and security enforcement. Provides context-aware assistance with enterprise-grade performance optimization.
